00055 void ZoneDialog::DoDataExchange(CDataExchange* pDX)
00056 {
00057         DDX_Control(pDX, IDC_ZONEIMAGE, m_image);
00058         DDX_Control(pDX, IDC_ZONE_SCROLLBAR1, m_vbar);
00059         DDX_Control(pDX, IDC_ZONE_SCROLLBAR2, m_hbar);
00060         DDX_Check(pDX, IDC_BUTTONZONENEW, m_creatingNew);
00061         DDX_Radio(pDX, IDC_ZONE_FRAME_VIEW, m_viewType);
00062         Invalidate();
00063         UpdateWindow();
00064 }
00065 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00066 void ZoneDialog::OnVScroll(UINT nSBCode, UINT nPos, CScrollBar* pScrollBar) 
00067 {
00068         int curpos = pScrollBar->GetScrollPos();
00069         int minpos;
00070         int maxpos;
00071         pScrollBar->GetScrollRange(&minpos, &maxpos);
00072         SCROLLINFO   info;
00073     pScrollBar->GetScrollInfo(&info, SIF_ALL);
00074         switch (nSBCode)
00075     {
00076                 case SB_TOP:      
00077                         curpos = minpos;
00078                         break;
00079                 case SB_BOTTOM:     
00080                         curpos = maxpos;
00081                         break;
00082                 case SB_ENDSCROLL: 
00083                         break;
00084                 case SB_LINEUP:      
00085                         if (curpos > minpos)
00086                                 curpos--;
00087                         break;
00088                 case SB_LINEDOWN:   
00089                         if (curpos < maxpos)
00090                                 curpos++;
00091                         break;
00092                 case SB_PAGEUP:    
00093                         curpos = max(minpos, curpos - (int) info.nPage);
00094                         break;
00095                 case SB_PAGEDOWN:
00096                         curpos = min(maxpos, curpos + (int) info.nPage);
00097                         break;
00098                 case SB_THUMBPOSITION: 
00099                         curpos = nPos;     
00100                         break;
00101                 case SB_THUMBTRACK:
00102                         curpos = nPos;     
00103                         break;
00104     }    
00105         offsety = curpos;
00106         pScrollBar->SetScrollPos(curpos);
00107         m_image.Invalidate();
00108     CDialog::OnVScroll(nSBCode, nPos, pScrollBar);
00109 }
00110 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00111 void ZoneDialog::OnHScroll(UINT nSBCode, UINT nPos, CScrollBar* pScrollBar) 
00112 {
00113         int curpos = pScrollBar->GetScrollPos();
00114         int minpos;
00115         int maxpos;

00119         switch (nSBCode)
00120     {
00121                 case SB_LEFT:      
00122                         curpos = minpos;
00123                         break;
00124                 case SB_RIGHT:     
00125                         curpos = maxpos;
00126                         break;
00127                 case SB_ENDSCROLL: 
00128                         break;
00129                 case SB_LINELEFT:      
00130                         if (curpos > minpos)
00131                                 curpos--;
00132                         break;

00134                         if (curpos < maxpos)
00135                                 curpos++;
00136                         break;
00137                 case SB_PAGELEFT:    
00138                         curpos = max(minpos, curpos - (int) info.nPage);
00139                         break;
00140                 case SB_PAGERIGHT:

00144                         curpos = nPos;

00148                         break;
00149     }    
00150         offsetx = curpos; 
00151         pScrollBar->SetScrollPos(curpos);
00152         m_image.Invalidate();

00173         m_iZone = -1;
00174         m_iPoint = -1;

00176 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00177 bool CZoneControl::Initialize(CNewVisionDoc* doc) {
00178         if (m_hWnd) {
00179                 ZoneDialog* tab = (ZoneDialog*)GetParent();
00180                 switch (tab->m_viewType) {
00181                         case ZONE_FRAME_VIEW:
00182                                 image.Destroy();
00183                                 image.CopyOf(imgFrame);
00184                                 break;
00185                         case ZONE_FLOOR_VIEW:
00186                                 image.Destroy();
00187                                 image.CopyOf(floorImg);
00188                                 cvZero(image.GetImage());
00189                                 tab->doc->floormodel.Draw(image.GetImage());
00190                 }
00191         
00192                 // Show scroll bars
00193                 CRect r; this->GetWindowRect(&r);
00194                 SCROLLINFO horz;
00195                 horz.cbSize = sizeof(SCROLLINFO);
00196                 horz.fMask = SIF_ALL;
00197                 horz.nPage = 50;
00198                 horz.nMin = 0;
00199                 horz.nMax = image.Width()-r.Width()+horz.nPage;
00200                 horz.nPos = 0;
00201                 horz.nTrackPos = 0;
00202                 tab->m_hbar.SetScrollInfo(&horz);
00203                 SCROLLINFO vert;
00204                 vert.cbSize = sizeof(SCROLLINFO);
00205                 vert.fMask = SIF_ALL;
00206                 vert.nPage = 50;
00207                 vert.nMin = 0;
00208                 vert.nMax = image.Height()-r.Height()+vert.nPage;
00209                 vert.nPos = 0;
00210                 vert.nTrackPos = 0;
00211                 tab->m_vbar.SetScrollInfo(&vert);
00212                 tab->m_vbar.ShowWindow(true);  //Hide Vertical Scroll Bar
00213                 tab->m_hbar.ShowWindow(true);  //Hide Horizontal Scroll Bar
00214                 tab->offsetx = 0; tab->offsety = 0;
00215                 this->Invalidate();
00216         }
00217         return true;
00218 }
00219 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00220 void CZoneControl::OnLButtonDown(UINT nFlags, CPoint point)
00221 {
00222         CWnd::OnLButtonDown(nFlags, point);
00223         ZoneDialog* tab = ((ZoneDialog*)this->GetParent());
00224         CPoint off = CPoint(tab->m_hbar.GetScrollPos(), tab->m_vbar.GetScrollPos());
00225         switch (tab->m_viewType) {
00226                 case ZONE_FRAME_VIEW:
00227                         if (tab->m_creatingNew) {
00228                                 CvPoint3D32f newPoint = tab->doc->cameramodel.coordsImage2Real(cvPoint2D32f(point.x+off.x, point.y+off.y));
00229                                 tab->zone.SetAt(++(tab->last_id), new FloorRegion(tab->last_id, tab->doc));
00230                                 m_iZone = tab->last_id;
00231                                 tab->zone[m_iZone]->p.Add(cvPoint2D32f(newPoint.x, newPoint.y));
00232                                 m_iPoint = 0;
00233                         }
00234                         else {
00235                                 if (PointInDot(point+off, m_iZone, m_iPoint)) {
00236                                         ;// nothing to do m_iPoint was already updated
00237                                 }
00238                                 else if (m_iZone >= 0) {
00239                                         CvPoint3D32f newPoint = tab->doc->cameramodel.coordsImage2Real(cvPoint2D32f(point.x+off.x, point.y+off.y));
00240                                         tab->zone[m_iZone]->p.Add(cvPoint2D32f(newPoint.x, newPoint.y));
00241                                         m_iPoint = tab->zone[m_iZone]->p.GetUpperBound();
00242                                 }
00243                         }
00244                         break;
00245                 case ZONE_FLOOR_VIEW:
00246                         ;
00247                 
00248         }
00249         Invalidate();
00250         UpdateWindow();
00251 }
00252 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00253 void CZoneControl::OnMouseMove(UINT nFlags, CPoint point)
00254 {
00255         CWnd::OnMouseMove(nFlags, point);
00256         if (m_iZone != -1 && (nFlags & MK_LBUTTON)) {
00257                 ZoneDialog* tab = (ZoneDialog*)GetParent();
00258                 CPoint off = CPoint(tab->m_hbar.GetScrollPos(), tab->m_vbar.GetScrollPos());
00259                 CvPoint3D32f newPoint = tab->doc->cameramodel.coordsImage2Real(cvPoint2D32f(point.x+off.x, point.y+off.y));
00260                 tab->zone[m_iZone]->p[m_iPoint] = cvPoint2D32f(newPoint.x, newPoint.y);
00261                 Invalidate();
00262                 UpdateWindow();
00263         }
00264 }
00265 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00266 void CZoneControl::OnLButtonUp(UINT nFlags, CPoint point)
00267 {
00268         CWnd::OnLButtonUp(nFlags, point);
00269         ZoneDialog* tab = (ZoneDialog*)GetParent();
00270         m_iPoint = -1;
00271         tab->m_creatingNew = 0;
00272         tab->UpdateData(false);
00273         Invalidate();
00274         UpdateWindow();
00275 }
00276 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00277 void CZoneControl::OnKeyDown(UINT nChar, UINT nRepCnt,  UINT nFlags) {
00278         CWnd::OnKeyDown(nChar, nRepCnt, nFlags);
00279         if (nChar == VK_DELETE && m_iZone != -1 && m_iPoint != -1) {
00280                 ZoneDialog* tab = (ZoneDialog*)GetParent();
00281                 FloorRegion *z;
00282                 if (tab->zone.Lookup(m_iZone, z)) {  
00283                         z->p.RemoveAt(m_iPoint); // delete one point from the current zone
00284                         if (!z->p.GetCount()) { // zone is empty
00285                                 tab->zone.RemoveKey(m_iZone);
00286                                 m_iZone = -1; m_iPoint = -1;                    
00287                                 if (m_iZone == tab->last_id)
00288                                         tab->last_id--;
00289                         }
00290                 }
00291                 UpdateData(false);
00292                 Invalidate();
00293                 UpdateWindow();
00294         }
00295 }
00296 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00297 bool CZoneControl::PointInDot(CPoint point, int &iZone, int &iPoint) {
00298         ZoneDialog* tab = (ZoneDialog*)GetParent();
00299         POSITION pos = tab->zone.GetStartPosition();
00300         while (pos) {
00301                 int i; FloorRegion *z;
00302                 tab->zone.GetNextAssoc(pos, i, z);
00303                 for (int j=0;j<z->p.GetCount();j++) {
00304                         CvPoint2D32f p2 = tab->doc->cameramodel.coordsReal2Image(cvPoint3D32f(z->p[j].x, z->p[j].y, 0));
00305                         if (d(cvPointFrom32f(p2), cvPoint(point)) <= DOT) {
00306                                 Invalidate();
00307                                 UpdateWindow();
00308                                 iZone = i; iPoint = j;
00309                                 return true; 
00310                         }
00311                 }
00312         }
00313         return false; // no match found
00314         }
00315 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00316 void CZoneControl::DrawItem(LPDRAWITEMSTRUCT lpDrawItemStruct) {
00317         CDC* pDC = CDC::FromHandle(lpDrawItemStruct->hDC);
00318         ZoneDialog* tab = (ZoneDialog*)GetParent();
00319         image.Show(pDC->m_hDC, 0, 0, image.Width(), image.Height(), tab->offsetx, tab->offsety);
00320         switch (tab->m_viewType) {
00321                 case ZONE_FRAME_VIEW:
00322                         tab->DrawFrame(pDC, CPoint(tab->offsetx, tab->offsety));
00323                         break;
00324                 case ZONE_FLOOR_VIEW:
00325                         tab->DrawFloor(pDC, CPoint(tab->offsetx, tab->offsety));
00326         }
00327 }
00328 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00329 void ZoneDialog::OnBnClickedButtonZoneFromObstacle()
00330 {
00331         CTextEntryDlg dlgTextEntry;
00332         if (!AfxMessageBox("This will create a number of interest zones based on existing obstacles. \nAre you sure?", MB_ICONEXCLAMATION | MB_YESNO))
00333                 return;
00334         int span = 0;
00335         if (dlgTextEntry.Show(theApp.m_pMainWnd, "Obstacle border span", "How wide does the zone span beyond the obstacle? (cm): ") == IDOK) {
00336                 CString strResult = dlgTextEntry.GetText();
00337                 span = _atoi64(strResult);
00338         }
00339 
00340         // Go through obstacles array
00341         for (int i=0;i<doc->obstaclemodel.obstacle.GetCount();i++) {
00342                 FloorRegion *z = new FloorRegion(++last_id, doc);
00343                 zone.SetAt(last_id, z);
00344                 
00345                 // NOTE! Now only works for Cuboid obstacles
00346                 Cuboid *cube;
00347                 if (doc->obstaclemodel.obstacle[i]->IsKindOf(RUNTIME_CLASS( Cuboid )))
00348                         cube = (Cuboid*)(doc->obstaclemodel.obstacle[i]);
00349                 else 
00350                         continue;
00351                 
00352                 z->p.Add(cvPoint2D32f(cube->v[0].x,cube->v[0].y));
00353                 z->p.Add(cvPoint2D32f(cube->v[1].x,cube->v[1].y));
00354                 z->p.Add(cvPoint2D32f(cube->v[2].x,cube->v[2].y));
00355                 z->p.Add(cvPoint2D32f(cube->v[3].x,cube->v[3].y));
00356                 z->label = cube->label;
00357                 z->AddBorder(span);
00358         }
00359         UpdateData(false);
00360 }
